00055 // first try node name, if not available (since is optional), fall back to original id
00056 template<class T>
00057 static const char *bc_get_joint_name(T *node)
00058 {
00059     const std::string& id = node->getName();
00060     return id.size() ? id.c_str() : node->getOriginalId().c_str();
00061 }
00062 
00063 FCurve *AnimationImporter::create_fcurve(int array_index, const char *rna_path)
00064 {
00065     FCurve *fcu = (FCurve*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(FCurve), "FCurve");
00066     fcu->flag = (FCURVE_VISIBLE|FCURVE_AUTO_HANDLES|FCURVE_SELECTED);
00067     fcu->rna_path = BLI_strdupn(rna_path, strlen(rna_path));
00068     fcu->array_index = array_index;
00069     return fcu;
00070 }
00071     
00072 void AnimationImporter::create_bezt(FCurve *fcu, float frame, float output)
00073 {
00074     BezTriple bez;
00075     memset(&bez, 0, sizeof(BezTriple));
00076     bez.vec[1][0] = frame;
00077     bez.vec[1][1] = output;
00078     bez.ipo = U.ipo_new; /* use default interpolation mode here... */
00079     bez.f1 = bez.f2 = bez.f3 = SELECT;
00080     bez.h1 = bez.h2 = HD_AUTO;
00081     insert_bezt_fcurve(fcu, &bez, 0);
00082     calchandles_fcurve(fcu);
00083 }
00084 
00085 // create one or several fcurves depending on the number of parameters being animated
00086 void AnimationImporter::animation_to_fcurves(COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve *curve)
00087 {
00088     COLLADAFW::FloatOrDoubleArray& input = curve->getInputValues();
00089     COLLADAFW::FloatOrDoubleArray& output = curve->getOutputValues();
00090 
00091     float fps = (float)FPS;
00092     size_t dim = curve->getOutDimension();
00093     unsigned int i;
00094 
00095     std::vector<FCurve*>& fcurves = curve_map[curve->getUniqueId()];
00096 
00097     switch (dim) {
00098     case 1: // X, Y, Z or angle
00099     case 3: // XYZ
00100     case 4:
00101     case 16: // matrix
00102         {
00103             for (i = 0; i < dim; i++ ) {
00104                 FCurve *fcu = (FCurve*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(FCurve), "FCurve");
00105 
00106                 fcu->flag = (FCURVE_VISIBLE|FCURVE_AUTO_HANDLES|FCURVE_SELECTED);
00107                 // fcu->rna_path = BLI_strdupn(path, strlen(path));
00108                 fcu->array_index = 0;
00109                 fcu->totvert = curve->getKeyCount();
00110 
00111                 // create beztriple for each key
00112                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < curve->getKeyCount(); j++) {
00113                     BezTriple bez;
00114                     memset(&bez, 0, sizeof(BezTriple));
00115 
00116 
00117                     // input, output
00118                     bez.vec[1][0] = bc_get_float_value(input, j) * fps; 
00119                     bez.vec[1][1] = bc_get_float_value(output, j * dim + i);
00120 
00121 
00122                     if ( curve->getInterpolationType() == COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve::INTERPOLATION_BEZIER ||
00123                         curve->getInterpolationType() == COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve::INTERPOLATION_STEP) 
00124                     {
00125                         COLLADAFW::FloatOrDoubleArray& intan = curve->getInTangentValues();
00126                         COLLADAFW::FloatOrDoubleArray& outtan = curve->getOutTangentValues();
00127 
00128                         // intangent
00129                         bez.vec[0][0] = bc_get_float_value(intan, (j * 2 * dim ) + (2 * i)) * fps;
00130                         bez.vec[0][1] = bc_get_float_value(intan, (j * 2 * dim )+ (2 * i) + 1);
00131 
00132                         // outtangent
00133                         bez.vec[2][0] = bc_get_float_value(outtan, (j * 2 * dim ) + (2 * i)) * fps;
00134                         bez.vec[2][1] = bc_get_float_value(outtan, (j * 2 * dim )+ (2 * i) + 1);
00135                         if (curve->getInterpolationType() == COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve::INTERPOLATION_BEZIER) 
00136                             bez.ipo = BEZT_IPO_BEZ;
00137                         else 
00138                             bez.ipo = BEZT_IPO_CONST;
00139                         //bez.h1 = bez.h2 = HD_AUTO;    
00140                     }
00141                     else 
00142                     {
00143                         bez.h1 = bez.h2 = HD_AUTO; 
00144                         bez.ipo = BEZT_IPO_LIN;
00145                     }
00146                     // bez.ipo = U.ipo_new; /* use default interpolation mode here... */
00147                     bez.f1 = bez.f2 = bez.f3 = SELECT;
00148 
00149                     insert_bezt_fcurve(fcu, &bez, 0);
00150                 }
00151 
00152                 calchandles_fcurve(fcu);
00153 
00154                 fcurves.push_back(fcu);
00155             }
00156         }
00157         break;
00158     default:
00159         fprintf(stderr, "Output dimension of %d is not yet supported (animation id = %s)\n", (int)dim, curve->getOriginalId().c_str());
00160     }
00161 
00162     for (std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator it = fcurves.begin(); it != fcurves.end(); it++)
00163         unused_curves.push_back(*it);
00164 }

00167 void AnimationImporter::fcurve_deg_to_rad(FCurve *cu)
00168 {
00169     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < cu->totvert; i++) {
00170         // TODO convert handles too
00171         cu->bezt[i].vec[1][1] *= DEG2RADF(1.0f);
00172         cu->bezt[i].vec[0][1] *= DEG2RADF(1.0f);
00173         cu->bezt[i].vec[2][1] *= DEG2RADF(1.0f);
00174     }
00175 }

00178 void AnimationImporter::add_fcurves_to_object(Object *ob, std::vector<FCurve*>& curves, char *rna_path, int array_index, Animation *animated)
00179 {
00180     bAction *act;
00181     
00182     if (!ob->adt || !ob->adt->action) act = verify_adt_action((ID*)&ob->id, 1);
00183     else act = ob->adt->action;
00184     
00185     std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator it;
00186     int i;
00187 
00188 #if 0
00189     char *p = strstr(rna_path, "rotation_euler");
00190     bool is_rotation = p && *(p + strlen("rotation_euler")) == '\0';
00191 
00192     // convert degrees to radians for rotation
00193     if (is_rotation)
00194         fcurve_deg_to_rad(fcu);
00195 #endif
00196     
00197     for (it = curves.begin(), i = 0; it != curves.end(); it++, i++) {
00198         FCurve *fcu = *it;
00199         fcu->rna_path = BLI_strdupn(rna_path, strlen(rna_path));
00200         
00201         if (array_index == -1) fcu->array_index = i;
00202         else fcu->array_index = array_index;
00203     
00204         if (ob->type == OB_ARMATURE) {
00205             bActionGroup *grp = NULL;
00206             const char *bone_name = bc_get_joint_name(animated->node);
00207             
00208             if (bone_name) {
00209                 /* try to find group */
00210                 grp = action_groups_find_named(act, bone_name);
00211                 
00212                 /* no matching groups, so add one */
00213                 if (grp == NULL) {
00214                     /* Add a new group, and make it active */
00215                     grp = (bActionGroup*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(bActionGroup), "bActionGroup");
00216                     
00217                     grp->flag = AGRP_SELECTED;
00218                     BLI_strncpy(grp->name, bone_name, sizeof(grp->name));
00219                     
00220                     BLI_addtail(&act->groups, grp);
00221                     BLI_uniquename(&act->groups, grp, "Group", '.', offsetof(bActionGroup, name), 64);
00222                 }
00223                 
00224                 /* add F-Curve to group */
00225                 action_groups_add_channel(act, grp, fcu);
00226                 
00227             }
00228 #if 0
00229             if (is_rotation) {
00230                 fcurves_actionGroup_map[grp].push_back(fcu);
00231             }
00232 #endif
00233         }
00234         else {
00235             BLI_addtail(&act->curves, fcu);
00236         }
00237 
00238         // curve is used, so remove it from unused_curves
00239         unused_curves.erase(std::remove(unused_curves.begin(), unused_curves.end(), fcu), unused_curves.end());
00240     }
00241 }

00246 AnimationImporter::~AnimationImporter()
00247 {
00248     // free unused FCurves
00249     for (std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator it = unused_curves.begin(); it != unused_curves.end(); it++)
00250         free_fcurve(*it);
00251 
00252     if (unused_curves.size())
00253         fprintf(stderr, "removed %d unused curves\n", (int)unused_curves.size());
00254 }

00256 bool AnimationImporter::write_animation(const COLLADAFW::Animation* anim) 
00257 {
00258     if (anim->getAnimationType() == COLLADAFW::Animation::ANIMATION_CURVE) {
00259         COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve *curve = (COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve*)anim;
00260         
00261         // XXX Don't know if it's necessary
00262         // Should we check outPhysicalDimension?
00263         if (curve->getInPhysicalDimension() != COLLADAFW::PHYSICAL_DIMENSION_TIME) {
00264             fprintf(stderr, "Inputs physical dimension is not time.\n");
00265             return true;
00266         }
00267 
00268         // a curve can have mixed interpolation type,
00269         // in this case curve->getInterpolationTypes returns a list of interpolation types per key
00270         COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve::InterpolationType interp = curve->getInterpolationType();
00271 
00272         if (interp != COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve::INTERPOLATION_MIXED) {
00273             switch (interp) {
00274             case COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve::INTERPOLATION_LINEAR:
00275             case COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve::INTERPOLATION_BEZIER:
00276             case COLLADAFW::AnimationCurve::INTERPOLATION_STEP:
00277                 animation_to_fcurves(curve);
00278                 break;
00279             default:
00280                 // TODO there're also CARDINAL, HERMITE, BSPLINE and STEP types
00281                 fprintf(stderr, "CARDINAL, HERMITE and BSPLINE anim interpolation types not supported yet.\n");
00282                 break;
00283             }
00284         }
00285         else {
00286             // not supported yet
00287             fprintf(stderr, "MIXED anim interpolation type is not supported yet.\n");
00288         }
00289     }
00290     else {
00291         fprintf(stderr, "FORMULA animation type is not supported yet.\n");
00292     }
00293     
00294     return true;
00295 }

00300     const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& animlist_id = animlist->getUniqueId();
00301

00303 
00304 #if 0
00305 
00306     // should not happen
00307     if (uid_animated_map.find(animlist_id) == uid_animated_map.end()) {
00308         return true;
00309     }
00310 
00311     // for bones rna_path is like: pose.bones["bone-name"].rotation
00312 
00313 
00314 #endif
00315 
00316     return true;
00317 }

00319 // \todo refactor read_node_transform to not automatically apply anything,
00320 // but rather return the transform matrix, so caller can do with it what is
00321 // necessary. Same for \ref get_node_mat
00322 void AnimationImporter::read_node_transform(COLLADAFW::Node *node, Object *ob)
00323 {
00324     float mat[4][4];
00325     TransformReader::get_node_mat(mat, node, &uid_animated_map, ob);
00326     if (ob) {
00327         copy_m4_m4(ob->obmat, mat);
00328         object_apply_mat4(ob, ob->obmat, 0, 0);
00329     }
00330 }

00333 virtual void AnimationImporter::change_eul_to_quat(Object *ob, bAction *act)

00335     bActionGroup *grp;
00336     int i;
00337     
00338     for (grp = (bActionGroup*)act->groups.first; grp; grp = grp->next) {
00339 
00340         FCurve *eulcu[3] = {NULL, NULL, NULL};
00341         
00342         if (fcurves_actionGroup_map.find(grp) == fcurves_actionGroup_map.end())
00343             continue;
00344 
00345         std::vector<FCurve*> &rot_fcurves = fcurves_actionGroup_map[grp];
00346         
00347         if (rot_fcurves.size() > 3) continue;
00348 
00349         for (i = 0; i < rot_fcurves.size(); i++)
00350             eulcu[rot_fcurves[i]->array_index] = rot_fcurves[i];
00351

00353         char rna_path[100];
00354

00359             create_fcurve(0, rna_path),
00360             create_fcurve(1, rna_path),

00362             create_fcurve(3, rna_path)
00363         };

00366 
00367         float m4[4][4], irest[3][3];

00382                     eulcu[1] ? evaluate_fcurve(eulcu[1], frame) : 0.0f,
00383                     eulcu[2] ? evaluate_fcurve(eulcu[2], frame) : 0.0f
00384                 };
00385 
00386                 // make eul relative to bone rest pose
00387                 float rot[3][3], rel[3][3], quat[4];
00388

00390

00393                 mat3_to_quat(quat, rel);
00394                 */

00397

00404 
00405         for (i = 0; i < 3; i++) {
00406             if (!eulcu[i]) continue;
00407

00409             free_fcurve(eulcu[i]);
00410         }
00411 
00412         chan->rotmode = ROT_MODE_QUAT;
00413 
00414         for (i = 0; i < 4; i++)
00415             action_groups_add_channel(act, grp, quatcu[i]);
00416     }
00417 
00418     bPoseChannel *pchan;
00419     for (pchan = (bPoseChannel*)ob->pose->chanbase.first; pchan; pchan = pchan->next) {
00420         pchan->rotmode = ROT_MODE_QUAT;
00421     }

00426 //sets the rna_path and array index to curve
00427 void AnimationImporter::modify_fcurve(std::vector<FCurve*>* curves , const char* rna_path , int array_index )
00428 {
00429     std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator it;
00430     int i;
00431     for (it = curves->begin(), i = 0; it != curves->end(); it++, i++) {
00432         FCurve *fcu = *it;
00433         fcu->rna_path = BLI_strdup(rna_path);
00434         
00435         if (array_index == -1) fcu->array_index = i;
00436         else fcu->array_index = array_index;
00437 
00438         unused_curves.erase(std::remove(unused_curves.begin(), unused_curves.end(), fcu), unused_curves.end());
00439     }
00440 }
00441 
00442 void AnimationImporter::find_frames( std::vector<float>* frames , std::vector<FCurve*>* curves)
00443 {
00444     std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator iter;
00445     for (iter = curves->begin(); iter != curves->end(); iter++) {
00446         FCurve *fcu = *iter;
00447 
00448         for (unsigned int k = 0; k < fcu->totvert; k++) {
00449             //get frame value from bezTriple
00450             float fra = fcu->bezt[k].vec[1][0];
00451             //if frame already not added add frame to frames
00452             if (std::find(frames->begin(), frames->end(), fra) == frames->end())
00453                 frames->push_back(fra);
00454 
00455         }
00456     }
00457 }

00459 //creates the rna_paths and array indices of fcurves from animations using transformation and bound animation class of each animation.
00460 void AnimationImporter:: Assign_transform_animations(COLLADAFW::Transformation * transform , 
00461                                                      const COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AnimationBinding * binding,
00462                                                      std::vector<FCurve*>* curves, bool is_joint, char * joint_path)
00463 {
00464     COLLADAFW::Transformation::TransformationType tm_type = transform->getTransformationType();
00465     bool is_matrix = tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX;
00466     bool is_rotation = tm_type  == COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE;
00467 
00468     //to check if the no of curves are valid
00469     bool xyz = ((tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE ||tm_type  == COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE) && binding->animationClass == COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_XYZ);
00470 
00471 
00472     if (!((!xyz && curves->size() == 1) || (xyz && curves->size() == 3) || is_matrix)) {
00473         fprintf(stderr, "expected %d curves, got %d\n", xyz ? 3 : 1, (int)curves->size());
00474         return;
00475     }
00476 
00477     char rna_path[100];
00478 
00479     switch (tm_type) {
00480         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE:
00481         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE:
00482             {
00483                 bool loc = tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE;
00484                 if (is_joint)
00485                     BLI_snprintf(rna_path, sizeof(rna_path), "%s.%s", joint_path, loc ? "location" : "scale");
00486                 else
00487                     BLI_strncpy(rna_path, loc ? "location" : "scale", sizeof(rna_path));
00488 
00489                 switch (binding->animationClass) {
00490         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_X:
00491             modify_fcurve(curves, rna_path, 0 );
00492             break;
00493         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_Y:
00494             modify_fcurve(curves, rna_path, 1 );
00495             break;
00496         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_Z:
00497             modify_fcurve(curves, rna_path, 2 );
00498             break;
00499         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_XYZ:
00500             modify_fcurve(curves, rna_path, -1 );
00501             break;
00502         default:
00503             fprintf(stderr, "AnimationClass %d is not supported for %s.\n",
00504                 binding->animationClass, loc ? "TRANSLATE" : "SCALE");
00505                 }
00506                 break;
00507             }
00508 
00509 
00510         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE:
00511             {
00512                 if (is_joint)
00513                     BLI_snprintf(rna_path, sizeof(rna_path), "%s.rotation_euler", joint_path);
00514                 else
00515                     BLI_strncpy(rna_path, "rotation_euler", sizeof(rna_path));
00516                 std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator iter;
00517                 for (iter = curves->begin(); iter != curves->end(); iter++) {
00518                     FCurve* fcu = *iter;
00519 
00520                     //if transform is rotation the fcurves values must be turned in to radian.
00521                     if (is_rotation)
00522                         fcurve_deg_to_rad(fcu);      
00523                 }                   
00524                 COLLADAFW::Rotate* rot = (COLLADAFW::Rotate*)transform;
00525                 COLLADABU::Math::Vector3& axis = rot->getRotationAxis();
00526 
00527                 switch (binding->animationClass) {
00528         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::ANGLE:
00529             if (COLLADABU::Math::Vector3::UNIT_X == axis) {
00530                 modify_fcurve(curves, rna_path, 0 );
00531             }
00532             else if (COLLADABU::Math::Vector3::UNIT_Y == axis) {
00533                 modify_fcurve(curves, rna_path, 1 );
00534             }
00535             else if (COLLADABU::Math::Vector3::UNIT_Z == axis) {
00536                 modify_fcurve(curves, rna_path, 2 );
00537             }
00538             break;
00539         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AXISANGLE:
00540             // TODO convert axis-angle to quat? or XYZ?
00541         default:
00542             fprintf(stderr, "AnimationClass %d is not supported for ROTATE transformation.\n",
00543                 binding->animationClass);
00544                 }
00545                 break;
00546             }
00547 
00548         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX:
00549             /*{
00550             COLLADAFW::Matrix* mat = (COLLADAFW::Matrix*)transform;
00551             COLLADABU::Math::Matrix4 mat4 = mat->getMatrix();
00552             switch (binding->animationClass) {
00553             case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::TRANSFORM:
00554 
00555             }
00556             }*/
00557             break;
00558         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::SKEW:
00559         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::LOOKAT:
00560             fprintf(stderr, "Animation of SKEW and LOOKAT transformations is not supported yet.\n");
00561             break;
00562     }
00563 
00564 }
00565 
00566 //creates the rna_paths and array indices of fcurves from animations using color and bound animation class of each animation.
00567 void AnimationImporter:: Assign_color_animations(const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid, ListBase *AnimCurves ,const char * anim_type)
00568 {
00569     char rna_path[100];
00570     BLI_strncpy(rna_path,anim_type, sizeof(rna_path));
00571 
00572     const COLLADAFW::AnimationList *animlist = animlist_map[listid];
00573     const COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AnimationBindings& bindings = animlist->getAnimationBindings();
00574     //all the curves belonging to the current binding
00575     std::vector<FCurve*> animcurves;
00576     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < bindings.getCount(); j++) {
00577         animcurves = curve_map[bindings[j].animation];
00578 
00579         switch (bindings[j].animationClass) {
00580         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::COLOR_R:
00581             modify_fcurve(&animcurves, rna_path, 0 );
00582             break;
00583         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::COLOR_G:
00584             modify_fcurve(&animcurves, rna_path, 1 );
00585             break;
00586         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::COLOR_B:
00587             modify_fcurve(&animcurves, rna_path, 2 );
00588             break;
00589         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::COLOR_RGB:
00590         case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::COLOR_RGBA: // to do-> set intensity
00591             modify_fcurve(&animcurves, rna_path, -1 );
00592             break;
00593 
00594         default:
00595             fprintf(stderr, "AnimationClass %d is not supported for %s.\n",
00596                 bindings[j].animationClass, "COLOR" );
00597         }
00598 
00599         std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator iter;
00600         //Add the curves of the current animation to the object
00601         for (iter = animcurves.begin(); iter != animcurves.end(); iter++) {
00602             FCurve * fcu = *iter;
00603             BLI_addtail(AnimCurves, fcu);   
00604         }
00605     }
00606 
00607 
00608 }
00609 
00610 void AnimationImporter:: Assign_float_animations(const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid, ListBase *AnimCurves, const char * anim_type)
00611 {
00612     char rna_path[100];
00613     if (animlist_map.find(listid) == animlist_map.end()) {
00614         return;
00615     }
00616     else {
00617         //anim_type has animations
00618         const COLLADAFW::AnimationList *animlist = animlist_map[listid];
00619         const COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AnimationBindings& bindings = animlist->getAnimationBindings();
00620         //all the curves belonging to the current binding
00621         std::vector<FCurve*> animcurves;
00622         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < bindings.getCount(); j++) {
00623             animcurves = curve_map[bindings[j].animation];
00624 
00625             BLI_strncpy(rna_path, anim_type , sizeof(rna_path));
00626             modify_fcurve(&animcurves, rna_path, 0 );
00627             std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator iter;
00628             //Add the curves of the current animation to the object
00629             for (iter = animcurves.begin(); iter != animcurves.end(); iter++) {
00630                 FCurve * fcu = *iter;
00631                 BLI_addtail(AnimCurves, fcu);
00632             }
00633         }
00634     }
00635     
00636 }
00637 
00638 void AnimationImporter::apply_matrix_curves( Object * ob, std::vector<FCurve*>& animcurves, COLLADAFW::Node* root ,COLLADAFW::Node* node, 
00639                                                     COLLADAFW::Transformation * tm )
00640 {
00641     bool is_joint = node->getType() == COLLADAFW::Node::JOINT;
00642     const char *bone_name = is_joint ? bc_get_joint_name(node) : NULL;
00643     char joint_path[200];
00644     if ( is_joint ) 
00645         armature_importer->get_rna_path_for_joint(node, joint_path, sizeof(joint_path));
00646 
00647     std::vector<float> frames;
00648     find_frames(&frames, &animcurves);
00649 
00650     float irest_dae[4][4];
00651     float rest[4][4], irest[4][4];
00652 
00653     if (is_joint) {
00654         get_joint_rest_mat(irest_dae, root, node);
00655         invert_m4(irest_dae);
00656 
00657         Bone *bone = get_named_bone((bArmature*)ob->data, bone_name);
00658         if (!bone) {
00659             fprintf(stderr, "cannot find bone \"%s\"\n", bone_name);
00660             return;
00661         }
00662 
00663         unit_m4(rest);
00664         copy_m4_m4(rest, bone->arm_mat);
00665         invert_m4_m4(irest, rest);
00666     }
00667     // new curves to assign matrix transform animation
00668     FCurve *newcu[10]; // if tm_type is matrix, then create 10 curves: 4 rot, 3 loc, 3 scale
00669     unsigned int totcu = 10;
00670     const char *tm_str = NULL;
00671     char rna_path[200];
00672     for (int i = 0; i < totcu; i++) {
00673 
00674         int axis = i;
00675 
00676         if (i < 4) {
00677             tm_str = "rotation_quaternion";
00678             axis = i;
00679         }
00680         else if (i < 7) {
00681             tm_str = "location";
00682             axis = i - 4;
00683         }
00684         else {
00685             tm_str = "scale";
00686             axis = i - 7;
00687         }
00688 
00689 
00690         if (is_joint)
00691             BLI_snprintf(rna_path, sizeof(rna_path), "%s.%s", joint_path, tm_str);
00692         else
00693             BLI_strncpy(rna_path, tm_str, sizeof(rna_path));
00694         newcu[i] = create_fcurve(axis, rna_path);
00695         newcu[i]->totvert = frames.size();
00696     }
00697 
00698     if (frames.size() == 0)
00699         return;
00700 
00701     std::sort(frames.begin(), frames.end());
00702 
00703     std::vector<float>::iterator it;
00704 
00705     // sample values at each frame
00706     for (it = frames.begin(); it != frames.end(); it++) {
00707         float fra = *it;
00708 
00709         float mat[4][4];
00710         float matfra[4][4];
00711 
00712         unit_m4(matfra);
00713 
00714         // calc object-space mat
00715         evaluate_transform_at_frame(matfra, node, fra);
00716 
00717 
00718         // for joints, we need a special matrix
00719         if (is_joint) {
00720             // special matrix: iR * M * iR_dae * R
00721             // where R, iR are bone rest and inverse rest mats in world space (Blender bones),
00722             // iR_dae is joint inverse rest matrix (DAE) and M is an evaluated joint world-space matrix (DAE)
00723             float temp[4][4], par[4][4];
00724 
00725             // calc M
00726             calc_joint_parent_mat_rest(par, NULL, root, node);
00727             mult_m4_m4m4(temp, par, matfra);
00728 
00729             // evaluate_joint_world_transform_at_frame(temp, NULL, , node, fra);
00730 
00731             // calc special matrix
00732             mul_serie_m4(mat, irest, temp, irest_dae, rest, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
00733         }
00734         else {
00735             copy_m4_m4(mat, matfra);
00736         }
00737 
00738         float  rot[4], loc[3], scale[3];
00739 
00740         mat4_to_quat(rot, mat);
00741         /*for ( int i = 0 ; i < 4  ;  i ++ )
00742         {
00743         rot[i] = RAD2DEGF(rot[i]);
00744         }*/
00745         copy_v3_v3(loc, mat[3]);
00746         mat4_to_size(scale, mat);
00747 
00748         // add keys
00749         for (int i = 0; i < totcu; i++) {
00750             if (i < 4)
00751                 add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, rot[i]);
00752             else if (i < 7)
00753                 add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, loc[i - 4]);
00754             else
00755                 add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, scale[i - 7]);
00756         }
00757     }
00758     verify_adt_action((ID*)&ob->id, 1);
00759 
00760     ListBase *curves = &ob->adt->action->curves;
00761 
00762     // add curves
00763     for (int i= 0; i < totcu; i++) {
00764         if (is_joint)
00765             add_bone_fcurve(ob, node, newcu[i]);
00766         else
00767             BLI_addtail(curves, newcu[i]);
00768     }
00769 
00770     if (is_joint) {
00771         bPoseChannel *chan = get_pose_channel(ob->pose, bone_name);
00772         chan->rotmode = ROT_MODE_QUAT;
00773     }
00774     else {
00775         ob->rotmode = ROT_MODE_QUAT;
00776     }
00777 
00778     return;
00779 
00780 }
00781 
00782 void AnimationImporter::translate_Animations ( COLLADAFW::Node * node , 
00783                                                    std::map<COLLADAFW::UniqueId, COLLADAFW::Node*>& root_map,
00784                                                    std::map<COLLADAFW::UniqueId, Object*>& object_map,
00785                                                    std::map<COLLADAFW::UniqueId, const COLLADAFW::Object*> FW_object_map)
00786 {
00787     AnimationImporter::AnimMix* animType = get_animation_type(node, FW_object_map );
00788 
00789     bool is_joint = node->getType() == COLLADAFW::Node::JOINT;
00790     COLLADAFW::Node *root = root_map.find(node->getUniqueId()) == root_map.end() ? node : root_map[node->getUniqueId()];
00791     Object *ob = is_joint ? armature_importer->get_armature_for_joint(root) : object_map[node->getUniqueId()];
00792     if (!ob)
00793     {
00794         fprintf(stderr, "cannot find Object for Node with id=\"%s\"\n", node->getOriginalId().c_str());
00795         return;
00796     }
00797 
00798     bAction * act;
00799 
00800     if ( (animType->transform) != 0 )
00801     {
00802         const char *bone_name = is_joint ? bc_get_joint_name(node) : NULL;
00803         char joint_path[200];
00804 
00805         if ( is_joint ) 
00806             armature_importer->get_rna_path_for_joint(node, joint_path, sizeof(joint_path));
00807 
00808 
00809         if (!ob->adt || !ob->adt->action) act = verify_adt_action((ID*)&ob->id, 1);
00810         else act = ob->adt->action;
00811 
00812         //Get the list of animation curves of the object
00813         ListBase *AnimCurves = &(act->curves);
00814 
00815         const COLLADAFW::TransformationPointerArray& nodeTransforms = node->getTransformations();
00816 
00817         //for each transformation in node 
00818         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeTransforms.getCount(); i++) {
00819             COLLADAFW::Transformation *transform = nodeTransforms[i];
00820             COLLADAFW::Transformation::TransformationType tm_type = transform->getTransformationType();
00821 
00822             bool is_rotation = tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE;
00823             bool is_matrix = tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX;
00824 
00825             const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = transform->getAnimationList();
00826 
00827             //check if transformation has animations
00828             if (animlist_map.find(listid) == animlist_map.end()) {
00829                 continue;
00830             }
00831             else {
00832                 //transformation has animations
00833                 const COLLADAFW::AnimationList *animlist = animlist_map[listid];
00834                 const COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AnimationBindings& bindings = animlist->getAnimationBindings();
00835                 //all the curves belonging to the current binding
00836                 std::vector<FCurve*> animcurves;
00837                 for (unsigned int j = 0; j < bindings.getCount(); j++) {
00838                     animcurves = curve_map[bindings[j].animation];
00839                     if ( is_matrix ) {
00840                         apply_matrix_curves(ob, animcurves, root , node,  transform  );
00841                     }
00842                     else {              
00843 
00844                         if (is_joint) {
00845 
00846                             add_bone_animation_sampled(ob, animcurves, root, node, transform);
00847                         }
00848                         else {
00849                             //calculate rnapaths and array index of fcurves according to transformation and animation class
00850                             Assign_transform_animations(transform, &bindings[j], &animcurves, is_joint, joint_path ); 
00851 
00852                             std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator iter;
00853                             //Add the curves of the current animation to the object
00854                             for (iter = animcurves.begin(); iter != animcurves.end(); iter++) {
00855                                 FCurve * fcu = *iter;
00856                             
00857                                 BLI_addtail(AnimCurves, fcu);
00858                             }
00859                         }
00860                         
00861                     }
00862                 }
00863             }
00864             if (is_rotation && !is_joint) {
00865                 ob->rotmode = ROT_MODE_EUL;
00866             }
00867         }
00868     }
00869 
00870     if ((animType->light) != 0)
00871     {
00872         Lamp * lamp  = (Lamp*) ob->data;
00873 
00874         if (!lamp->adt || !lamp->adt->action) act = verify_adt_action((ID*)&lamp->id, 1);
00875         else act = lamp->adt->action;
00876 
00877         ListBase *AnimCurves = &(act->curves);
00878         const COLLADAFW::InstanceLightPointerArray& nodeLights = node->getInstanceLights();
00879 
00880         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeLights.getCount(); i++) {
00881             const COLLADAFW::Light *light = (COLLADAFW::Light *) FW_object_map[nodeLights[i]->getInstanciatedObjectId()];
00882 
00883             if ((animType->light & LIGHT_COLOR) != 0)
00884             {
00885                 const COLLADAFW::Color *col =  &(light->getColor());
00886                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = col->getAnimationList();
00887 
00888                 Assign_color_animations(listid, AnimCurves, "color"); 
00889             }
00890             if ((animType->light & LIGHT_FOA) != 0 )
00891             {
00892                 const COLLADAFW::AnimatableFloat *foa =  &(light->getFallOffAngle());
00893                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = foa->getAnimationList();
00894 
00895                 Assign_float_animations( listid ,AnimCurves, "spot_size"); 
00896             }
00897             if ( (animType->light & LIGHT_FOE) != 0 )
00898             {
00899                 const COLLADAFW::AnimatableFloat *foe =  &(light->getFallOffExponent());
00900                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = foe->getAnimationList();
00901 
00902                 Assign_float_animations( listid ,AnimCurves, "spot_blend"); 
00903 
00904             }
00905         }
00906     }
00907 
00908     if ( (animType->camera) != 0) 
00909     {
00910         Camera * camera  = (Camera*) ob->data;
00911 
00912         if (!camera->adt || !camera->adt->action) act = verify_adt_action((ID*)&camera->id, 1);
00913         else act = camera->adt->action;
00914 
00915         ListBase *AnimCurves = &(act->curves);
00916         const COLLADAFW::InstanceCameraPointerArray& nodeCameras= node->getInstanceCameras();
00917 
00918         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeCameras.getCount(); i++) {
00919             const COLLADAFW::Camera *camera = (COLLADAFW::Camera *) FW_object_map[nodeCameras[i]->getInstanciatedObjectId()];
00920 
00921             if ((animType->camera & CAMERA_XFOV) != 0 )
00922             {
00923                 const COLLADAFW::AnimatableFloat *xfov =  &(camera->getXFov());
00924                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = xfov->getAnimationList();
00925                 Assign_float_animations( listid ,AnimCurves, "lens"); 
00926             }
00927 
00928             else if ((animType->camera & CAMERA_XMAG) != 0 )
00929             {
00930                 const COLLADAFW::AnimatableFloat *xmag =  &(camera->getXMag());
00931                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = xmag->getAnimationList();
00932                 Assign_float_animations( listid ,AnimCurves, "ortho_scale"); 
00933             }
00934 
00935             if ((animType->camera & CAMERA_ZFAR) != 0 )
00936             {
00937                 const COLLADAFW::AnimatableFloat *zfar =  &(camera->getFarClippingPlane());
00938                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = zfar->getAnimationList();
00939                 Assign_float_animations( listid ,AnimCurves, "clip_end"); 
00940             }
00941 
00942             if ((animType->camera & CAMERA_ZNEAR) != 0 )
00943             {
00944                 const COLLADAFW::AnimatableFloat *znear =  &(camera->getNearClippingPlane());
00945                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = znear->getAnimationList();
00946                 Assign_float_animations( listid ,AnimCurves, "clip_start"); 
00947             }
00948 
00949         }
00950     }
00951     if ( animType->material != 0) {
00952         Material *ma = give_current_material(ob, 1);
00953         if (!ma->adt || !ma->adt->action) act = verify_adt_action((ID*)&ma->id, 1);
00954         else act = ma->adt->action;
00955 
00956         ListBase *AnimCurves = &(act->curves);
00957 
00958         const COLLADAFW::InstanceGeometryPointerArray& nodeGeoms = node->getInstanceGeometries();
00959         for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeGeoms.getCount(); i++) {
00960             const COLLADAFW::MaterialBindingArray& matBinds = nodeGeoms[i]->getMaterialBindings();
00961             for (unsigned int j = 0; j < matBinds.getCount(); j++) {
00962                 const COLLADAFW::UniqueId & matuid = matBinds[j].getReferencedMaterial();
00963                 const COLLADAFW::Effect *ef = (COLLADAFW::Effect *) (FW_object_map[matuid]);
00964                 if (ef != NULL) { /* can be NULL [#28909] */
00965                     const COLLADAFW::CommonEffectPointerArray& commonEffects  =  ef->getCommonEffects();
00966                     COLLADAFW::EffectCommon *efc = commonEffects[0];
00967                     if ((animType->material & MATERIAL_SHININESS) != 0) {
00968                         const COLLADAFW::FloatOrParam *shin = &(efc->getShininess());
00969                         const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid =  shin->getAnimationList();
00970                         Assign_float_animations( listid, AnimCurves , "specular_hardness" );
00971                     }
00972 
00973                     if ((animType->material & MATERIAL_IOR) != 0) {
00974                         const COLLADAFW::FloatOrParam *ior = &(efc->getIndexOfRefraction());
00975                         const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid =  ior->getAnimationList();
00976                         Assign_float_animations( listid, AnimCurves , "raytrace_transparency.ior" );
00977                     }
00978 
00979                     if ((animType->material & MATERIAL_SPEC_COLOR) != 0) {
00980                         const COLLADAFW::ColorOrTexture *cot = &(efc->getSpecular());
00981                         const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid =  cot->getColor().getAnimationList();
00982                         Assign_color_animations( listid, AnimCurves , "specular_color" );
00983                     }
00984 
00985                     if ((animType->material & MATERIAL_DIFF_COLOR) != 0) {
00986                         const COLLADAFW::ColorOrTexture *cot = &(efc->getDiffuse());
00987                         const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid =  cot->getColor().getAnimationList();
00988                         Assign_color_animations( listid, AnimCurves , "diffuse_color" );
00989                     }
00990                 }
00991             }
00992         }   
00993     }
00994 }
00995 
00996 void AnimationImporter::add_bone_animation_sampled(Object * ob, std::vector<FCurve*>& animcurves, COLLADAFW::Node* root, COLLADAFW::Node* node, COLLADAFW::Transformation * tm)
00997 {
00998     const char *bone_name = bc_get_joint_name(node);
00999     char joint_path[200];
01000     armature_importer->get_rna_path_for_joint(node, joint_path, sizeof(joint_path));
01001 
01002     std::vector<float> frames;
01003     find_frames(&frames, &animcurves);
01004 
01005     // convert degrees to radians
01006     if (tm->getTransformationType() == COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE) {
01007 
01008         std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator iter;
01009         for (iter = animcurves.begin(); iter != animcurves.end(); iter++) {
01010             FCurve* fcu = *iter;
01011 
01012             fcurve_deg_to_rad(fcu);      
01013         }                   
01014     }
01015 
01016 
01017     float irest_dae[4][4];
01018     float rest[4][4], irest[4][4];
01019 
01020     get_joint_rest_mat(irest_dae, root, node);
01021     invert_m4(irest_dae);
01022 
01023     Bone *bone = get_named_bone((bArmature*)ob->data, bone_name);
01024     if (!bone) {
01025         fprintf(stderr, "cannot find bone \"%s\"\n", bone_name);
01026         return;
01027     }
01028 
01029     unit_m4(rest);
01030     copy_m4_m4(rest, bone->arm_mat);
01031     invert_m4_m4(irest, rest);
01032 
01033     // new curves to assign matrix transform animation
01034     FCurve *newcu[10]; // if tm_type is matrix, then create 10 curves: 4 rot, 3 loc, 3 scale
01035     unsigned int totcu = 10;
01036     const char *tm_str = NULL;
01037     char rna_path[200];
01038     for (int i = 0; i < totcu; i++) {
01039 
01040         int axis = i;
01041 
01042         if (i < 4) {
01043             tm_str = "rotation_quaternion";
01044             axis = i;
01045         }
01046         else if (i < 7) {
01047             tm_str = "location";
01048             axis = i - 4;
01049         }
01050         else {
01051             tm_str = "scale";
01052             axis = i - 7;
01053         }
01054 
01055 
01056         BLI_snprintf(rna_path, sizeof(rna_path), "%s.%s", joint_path, tm_str);
01057 
01058         newcu[i] = create_fcurve(axis, rna_path);
01059         newcu[i]->totvert = frames.size();
01060     }
01061 
01062     if (frames.size() == 0)
01063         return;
01064 
01065     std::sort(frames.begin(), frames.end());
01066 
01067     std::vector<float>::iterator it;
01068 
01069     // sample values at each frame
01070     for (it = frames.begin(); it != frames.end(); it++) {
01071         float fra = *it;
01072 
01073         float mat[4][4];
01074         float matfra[4][4];
01075 
01076         unit_m4(matfra);
01077 
01078         // calc object-space mat
01079         evaluate_transform_at_frame(matfra, node, fra);
01080 
01081 
01082         // for joints, we need a special matrix
01083         // special matrix: iR * M * iR_dae * R
01084         // where R, iR are bone rest and inverse rest mats in world space (Blender bones),
01085         // iR_dae is joint inverse rest matrix (DAE) and M is an evaluated joint world-space matrix (DAE)
01086         float temp[4][4], par[4][4];
01087 
01088 
01089         // calc M
01090         calc_joint_parent_mat_rest(par, NULL, root, node);
01091         mult_m4_m4m4(temp, par, matfra);
01092 
01093         // evaluate_joint_world_transform_at_frame(temp, NULL, , node, fra);
01094 
01095         // calc special matrix
01096         mul_serie_m4(mat, irest, temp, irest_dae, rest, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01097 
01098         float  rot[4], loc[3], scale[3];
01099 
01100         mat4_to_quat(rot, mat);
01101         copy_v3_v3(loc, mat[3]);
01102         mat4_to_size(scale, mat);
01103 
01104         // add keys
01105         for (int i = 0; i < totcu; i++) {
01106             if (i < 4)
01107                 add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, rot[i]);
01108             else if (i < 7)
01109                 add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, loc[i - 4]);
01110             else
01111                 add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, scale[i - 7]);
01112         }
01113     }
01114     verify_adt_action((ID*)&ob->id, 1);
01115 
01116     // add curves
01117     for (int i= 0; i < totcu; i++) {
01118         add_bone_fcurve(ob, node, newcu[i]);
01119     }
01120 
01121     bPoseChannel *chan = get_pose_channel(ob->pose, bone_name);
01122     chan->rotmode = ROT_MODE_QUAT;
01123 
01124 }
01125 
01126 
01127 //Check if object is animated by checking if animlist_map holds the animlist_id of node transforms
01128 AnimationImporter::AnimMix* AnimationImporter::get_animation_type ( const COLLADAFW::Node * node , 
01129                                             std::map<COLLADAFW::UniqueId, const COLLADAFW::Object*> FW_object_map) 
01130 {
01131     AnimMix *types = new AnimMix();
01132 
01133     const COLLADAFW::TransformationPointerArray& nodeTransforms = node->getTransformations();
01134 
01135     //for each transformation in node 
01136     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeTransforms.getCount(); i++) {
01137         COLLADAFW::Transformation *transform = nodeTransforms[i];
01138         const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = transform->getAnimationList();
01139 
01140         //check if transformation has animations
01141         if (animlist_map.find(listid) == animlist_map.end()) {
01142             continue;
01143         }
01144         else {
01145             types->transform = types->transform|NODE_TRANSFORM;
01146             break;
01147         }
01148     }
01149     const COLLADAFW::InstanceLightPointerArray& nodeLights = node->getInstanceLights();
01150 
01151     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeLights.getCount(); i++) {
01152         const COLLADAFW::Light *light = (COLLADAFW::Light *) FW_object_map[nodeLights[i]->getInstanciatedObjectId()];
01153         types->light = setAnimType(&(light->getColor()),(types->light), LIGHT_COLOR);
01154         types->light = setAnimType(&(light->getFallOffAngle()),(types->light), LIGHT_FOA);
01155         types->light = setAnimType(&(light->getFallOffExponent()),(types->light), LIGHT_FOE);
01156 
01157         if ( types->light != 0) break;
01158 
01159     }
01160 
01161     const COLLADAFW::InstanceCameraPointerArray& nodeCameras = node->getInstanceCameras();
01162     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeCameras.getCount(); i++) {
01163         const COLLADAFW::Camera *camera = (COLLADAFW::Camera *) FW_object_map[nodeCameras[i]->getInstanciatedObjectId()];
01164 
01165         if ( camera->getCameraType() == COLLADAFW::Camera::PERSPECTIVE )
01166         {
01167             types->camera = setAnimType(&(camera->getXMag()),(types->camera), CAMERA_XFOV);
01168         }
01169         else
01170         {
01171             types->camera = setAnimType(&(camera->getXMag()),(types->camera), CAMERA_XMAG);
01172         }
01173         types->camera = setAnimType(&(camera->getFarClippingPlane()),(types->camera), CAMERA_ZFAR);
01174         types->camera = setAnimType(&(camera->getNearClippingPlane()),(types->camera), CAMERA_ZNEAR);
01175 
01176         if ( types->camera != 0) break;
01177 
01178     }
01179 
01180     const COLLADAFW::InstanceGeometryPointerArray& nodeGeoms = node->getInstanceGeometries();
01181     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < nodeGeoms.getCount(); i++) {
01182         const COLLADAFW::MaterialBindingArray& matBinds = nodeGeoms[i]->getMaterialBindings();
01183         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < matBinds.getCount(); j++) {
01184             const COLLADAFW::UniqueId & matuid = matBinds[j].getReferencedMaterial();
01185             const COLLADAFW::Effect *ef = (COLLADAFW::Effect *) (FW_object_map[matuid]);
01186             if (ef != NULL) { /* can be NULL [#28909] */
01187                 const COLLADAFW::CommonEffectPointerArray& commonEffects = ef->getCommonEffects();
01188                 if (!commonEffects.empty()) {
01189                     COLLADAFW::EffectCommon *efc = commonEffects[0];
01190                     types->material =  setAnimType(&(efc->getShininess()),(types->material), MATERIAL_SHININESS);
01191                     types->material =  setAnimType(&(efc->getSpecular().getColor()),(types->material), MATERIAL_SPEC_COLOR);
01192                     types->material =  setAnimType(&(efc->getDiffuse().getColor()),(types->material), MATERIAL_DIFF_COLOR);
01193                     // types->material =  setAnimType(&(efc->get()),(types->material), MATERIAL_TRANSPARENCY);
01194                     types->material =  setAnimType(&(efc->getIndexOfRefraction()),(types->material), MATERIAL_IOR);
01195                 }
01196             }
01197         }
01198     }
01199     return types;
01200 }
01201 
01202 int AnimationImporter::setAnimType ( const COLLADAFW::Animatable * prop , int types, int addition)
01203 {
01204     const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid =  prop->getAnimationList();
01205     if (animlist_map.find(listid) != animlist_map.end())
01206         return types|addition;
01207     else return types;
01208 }       
01209 
01210 // Is not used anymore.
01211 void AnimationImporter::find_frames_old(std::vector<float> * frames, COLLADAFW::Node * node , COLLADAFW::Transformation::TransformationType tm_type)
01212 {
01213     bool is_matrix = tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX;
01214     bool is_rotation = tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE;
01215     // for each <rotate>, <translate>, etc. there is a separate Transformation
01216     const COLLADAFW::TransformationPointerArray& nodeTransforms = node->getTransformations();
01217 
01218     unsigned int i;
01219     // find frames at which to sample plus convert all rotation keys to radians
01220     for (i = 0; i < nodeTransforms.getCount(); i++) {
01221         COLLADAFW::Transformation *transform = nodeTransforms[i];
01222         COLLADAFW::Transformation::TransformationType nodeTmType = transform->getTransformationType();
01223 
01224 
01225         if (nodeTmType == tm_type) {
01226             //get animation bindings for the current transformation
01227             const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = transform->getAnimationList();
01228             //if transform is animated its animlist must exist.
01229             if (animlist_map.find(listid) != animlist_map.end()) {
01230                 
01231                 const COLLADAFW::AnimationList *animlist = animlist_map[listid];
01232                 const COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AnimationBindings& bindings = animlist->getAnimationBindings();
01233 
01234                 if (bindings.getCount()) {
01235                     //for each AnimationBinding get the fcurves which animate the transform
01236                     for (unsigned int j = 0; j < bindings.getCount(); j++) {
01237                         std::vector<FCurve*>& curves = curve_map[bindings[j].animation];
01238                         bool xyz = ((nodeTmType == COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE || nodeTmType == COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE) && bindings[j].animationClass == COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_XYZ);
01239 
01240                         if ((!xyz && curves.size() == 1) || (xyz && curves.size() == 3) || is_matrix) {
01241                             std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator iter;
01242 
01243                             for (iter = curves.begin(); iter != curves.end(); iter++) {
01244                                 FCurve *fcu = *iter;
01245 
01246                                 //if transform is rotation the fcurves values must be turned in to radian.
01247                                 if (is_rotation)
01248                                     fcurve_deg_to_rad(fcu);
01249 
01250                                 for (unsigned int k = 0; k < fcu->totvert; k++) {
01251                                     //get frame value from bezTriple
01252                                     float fra = fcu->bezt[k].vec[1][0];
01253                                     //if frame already not added add frame to frames
01254                                     if (std::find(frames->begin(), frames->end(), fra) == frames->end())
01255                                         frames->push_back(fra);
01256                                 }
01257                             }
01258                         }
01259                         else {
01260                             fprintf(stderr, "expected %d curves, got %d\n", xyz ? 3 : 1, (int)curves.size());
01261                         }
01262                     }
01263                 }
01264             }
01265         }
01266     }
01267 }
01268 
01269 
01270 
01271 // prerequisites:
01272 // animlist_map - map animlist id -> animlist
01273 // curve_map - map anim id -> curve(s)
01274 Object *AnimationImporter::translate_animation_OLD(COLLADAFW::Node *node,
01275                             std::map<COLLADAFW::UniqueId, Object*>& object_map,
01276                             std::map<COLLADAFW::UniqueId, COLLADAFW::Node*>& root_map,
01277                             COLLADAFW::Transformation::TransformationType tm_type,
01278                             Object *par_job)
01279 {
01280     
01281     bool is_rotation = tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE;
01282     bool is_matrix = tm_type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX;
01283     bool is_joint = node->getType() == COLLADAFW::Node::JOINT;
01284     
01285     COLLADAFW::Node *root = root_map.find(node->getUniqueId()) == root_map.end() ? node : root_map[node->getUniqueId()];
01286     Object *ob = is_joint ? armature_importer->get_armature_for_joint(node) : object_map[node->getUniqueId()];
01287     const char *bone_name = is_joint ? bc_get_joint_name(node) : NULL;
01288     if (!ob) {
01289         fprintf(stderr, "cannot find Object for Node with id=\"%s\"\n", node->getOriginalId().c_str());
01290         return NULL;
01291     }
01292 
01293     // frames at which to sample
01294     std::vector<float> frames;
01295     
01296     find_frames_old(&frames, node , tm_type);
01297     
01298     unsigned int i;
01299     
01300     float irest_dae[4][4];
01301     float rest[4][4], irest[4][4];
01302 
01303     if (is_joint) {
01304         get_joint_rest_mat(irest_dae, root, node);
01305         invert_m4(irest_dae);
01306 
01307         Bone *bone = get_named_bone((bArmature*)ob->data, bone_name);
01308         if (!bone) {
01309             fprintf(stderr, "cannot find bone \"%s\"\n", bone_name);
01310             return NULL;
01311         }
01312 
01313         unit_m4(rest);
01314         copy_m4_m4(rest, bone->arm_mat);
01315         invert_m4_m4(irest, rest);
01316     }
01317 
01318     Object *job = NULL;
01319 
01320 #ifdef ARMATURE_TEST
01321     FCurve *job_curves[10];
01322     job = get_joint_object(root, node, par_job);
01323 #endif
01324 
01325     if (frames.size() == 0)
01326         return job;
01327 
01328     std::sort(frames.begin(), frames.end());
01329 
01330     const char *tm_str = NULL;
01331     switch (tm_type) {
01332     case COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE:
01333         tm_str = "rotation_quaternion";
01334         break;
01335     case COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE:
01336         tm_str = "scale";
01337         break;
01338     case COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE:
01339         tm_str = "location";
01340         break;
01341     case COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX:
01342         break;
01343     default:
01344         return job;
01345     }
01346 
01347     char rna_path[200];
01348     char joint_path[200];
01349 
01350     if (is_joint)
01351         armature_importer->get_rna_path_for_joint(node, joint_path, sizeof(joint_path));
01352 
01353     // new curves
01354     FCurve *newcu[10]; // if tm_type is matrix, then create 10 curves: 4 rot, 3 loc, 3 scale
01355     unsigned int totcu = is_matrix ? 10 : (is_rotation ? 4 : 3);
01356 
01357     for (i = 0; i < totcu; i++) {
01358 
01359         int axis = i;
01360 
01361         if (is_matrix) {
01362             if (i < 4) {
01363                 tm_str = "rotation_quaternion";
01364                 axis = i;
01365             }
01366             else if (i < 7) {
01367                 tm_str = "location";
01368                 axis = i - 4;
01369             }
01370             else {
01371                 tm_str = "scale";
01372                 axis = i - 7;
01373             }
01374         }
01375 
01376         if (is_joint)
01377             BLI_snprintf(rna_path, sizeof(rna_path), "%s.%s", joint_path, tm_str);
01378         else
01379             BLI_strncpy(rna_path, tm_str, sizeof(rna_path));
01380         newcu[i] = create_fcurve(axis, rna_path);
01381 
01382 #ifdef ARMATURE_TEST
01383         if (is_joint)
01384             job_curves[i] = create_fcurve(axis, tm_str);
01385 #endif
01386     }
01387 
01388     std::vector<float>::iterator it;
01389 
01390     // sample values at each frame
01391     for (it = frames.begin(); it != frames.end(); it++) {
01392         float fra = *it;
01393 
01394         float mat[4][4];
01395         float matfra[4][4];
01396 
01397         unit_m4(matfra);
01398 
01399         // calc object-space mat
01400         evaluate_transform_at_frame(matfra, node, fra);
01401 
01402         // for joints, we need a special matrix
01403         if (is_joint) {
01404             // special matrix: iR * M * iR_dae * R
01405             // where R, iR are bone rest and inverse rest mats in world space (Blender bones),
01406             // iR_dae is joint inverse rest matrix (DAE) and M is an evaluated joint world-space matrix (DAE)
01407             float temp[4][4], par[4][4];
01408 
01409             // calc M
01410             calc_joint_parent_mat_rest(par, NULL, root, node);
01411             mult_m4_m4m4(temp, par, matfra);
01412 
01413             // evaluate_joint_world_transform_at_frame(temp, NULL, , node, fra);
01414 
01415             // calc special matrix
01416             mul_serie_m4(mat, irest, temp, irest_dae, rest, NULL, NULL, NULL, NULL);
01417         }
01418         else {
01419             copy_m4_m4(mat, matfra);
01420         }
01421 
01422         float val[4], rot[4], loc[3], scale[3];
01423 
01424         switch (tm_type) {
01425         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE:
01426             mat4_to_quat(val, mat);
01427             break;
01428         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE:
01429             mat4_to_size(val, mat);
01430             break;
01431         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE:
01432             copy_v3_v3(val, mat[3]);
01433             break;
01434         case COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX:
01435             mat4_to_quat(rot, mat);
01436             copy_v3_v3(loc, mat[3]);
01437             mat4_to_size(scale, mat);
01438             break;
01439         default:
01440             break;
01441         }
01442 
01443         // add keys
01444         for (i = 0; i < totcu; i++) {
01445             if (is_matrix) {
01446                 if (i < 4)
01447                     add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, rot[i]);
01448                 else if (i < 7)
01449                     add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, loc[i - 4]);
01450                 else
01451                     add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, scale[i - 7]);
01452             }
01453             else {
01454                 add_bezt(newcu[i], fra, val[i]);
01455             }
01456         }
01457 
01458 #ifdef ARMATURE_TEST
01459         if (is_joint) {
01460             switch (tm_type) {
01461             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE:
01462                 mat4_to_quat(val, matfra);
01463                 break;
01464             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE:
01465                 mat4_to_size(val, matfra);
01466                 break;
01467             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE:
01468                 copy_v3_v3(val, matfra[3]);
01469                 break;
01470             case MATRIX:
01471                 mat4_to_quat(rot, matfra);
01472                 copy_v3_v3(loc, matfra[3]);
01473                 mat4_to_size(scale, matfra);
01474                 break;
01475             default:
01476                 break;
01477             }
01478 
01479             for (i = 0; i < totcu; i++) {
01480                 if (is_matrix) {
01481                     if (i < 4)
01482                         add_bezt(job_curves[i], fra, rot[i]);
01483                     else if (i < 7)
01484                         add_bezt(job_curves[i], fra, loc[i - 4]);
01485                     else
01486                         add_bezt(job_curves[i], fra, scale[i - 7]);
01487                 }
01488                 else {
01489                     add_bezt(job_curves[i], fra, val[i]);
01490                 }
01491             }
01492         }
01493 #endif
01494     }
01495 
01496     verify_adt_action((ID*)&ob->id, 1);
01497 
01498     ListBase *curves = &ob->adt->action->curves;
01499 
01500     // add curves
01501     for (i = 0; i < totcu; i++) {
01502         if (is_joint)
01503             add_bone_fcurve(ob, node, newcu[i]);
01504         else
01505             BLI_addtail(curves, newcu[i]);
01506 
01507 #ifdef ARMATURE_TEST
01508         if (is_joint)
01509             BLI_addtail(&job->adt->action->curves, job_curves[i]);
01510 #endif
01511     }
01512 
01513     if (is_rotation || is_matrix) {
01514         if (is_joint) {
01515             bPoseChannel *chan = get_pose_channel(ob->pose, bone_name);
01516             chan->rotmode = ROT_MODE_QUAT;
01517         }
01518         else {
01519             ob->rotmode = ROT_MODE_QUAT;
01520         }
01521     }
01522 
01523     return job;
01524 }
01525 
01526 // internal, better make it private
01527 // warning: evaluates only rotation and only assigns matrix transforms now
01528 // prerequisites: animlist_map, curve_map
01529 void AnimationImporter::evaluate_transform_at_frame(float mat[4][4], COLLADAFW::Node *node, float fra)
01530 {
01531     const COLLADAFW::TransformationPointerArray& tms = node->getTransformations();
01532 
01533     unit_m4(mat);
01534 
01535     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < tms.getCount(); i++) {
01536         COLLADAFW::Transformation *tm = tms[i];
01537         COLLADAFW::Transformation::TransformationType type = tm->getTransformationType();
01538         float m[4][4];
01539 
01540         unit_m4(m);
01541 
01542         std::string nodename = node->getName().size() ? node->getName() : node->getOriginalId();
01543         if (!evaluate_animation(tm, m, fra, nodename.c_str())) {
01544             switch (type) {
01545             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE:
01546                 dae_rotate_to_mat4(tm, m);
01547                 break;
01548             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE:
01549                 dae_translate_to_mat4(tm, m);
01550                 break;
01551             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE:
01552                 dae_scale_to_mat4(tm, m);
01553                 break;
01554             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX:
01555                 dae_matrix_to_mat4(tm, m);
01556                 break;
01557             default:
01558                 fprintf(stderr, "unsupported transformation type %d\n", type);
01559             }
01560             // dae_matrix_to_mat4(tm, m);
01561             
01562         }
01563 
01564         float temp[4][4];
01565         copy_m4_m4(temp, mat);
01566 
01567         mult_m4_m4m4(mat, temp, m);
01568     }
01569 }
01570 
01571 // return true to indicate that mat contains a sane value
01572 bool AnimationImporter::evaluate_animation(COLLADAFW::Transformation *tm, float mat[4][4], float fra, const char *node_id)
01573 {
01574     const COLLADAFW::UniqueId& listid = tm->getAnimationList();
01575     COLLADAFW::Transformation::TransformationType type = tm->getTransformationType();
01576 
01577     if (type != COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE &&
01578         type != COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE &&
01579         type != COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE &&
01580         type != COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX) {
01581         fprintf(stderr, "animation of transformation %d is not supported yet\n", type);
01582         return false;
01583     }
01584 
01585     if (animlist_map.find(listid) == animlist_map.end())
01586         return false;
01587 
01588     const COLLADAFW::AnimationList *animlist = animlist_map[listid];
01589     const COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AnimationBindings& bindings = animlist->getAnimationBindings();
01590 
01591     if (bindings.getCount()) {
01592         float vec[3];
01593 
01594         bool is_scale = (type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE);
01595         bool is_translate = (type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE);
01596 
01597         if (is_scale)
01598             dae_scale_to_v3(tm, vec);
01599         else if (is_translate)
01600             dae_translate_to_v3(tm, vec);
01601 
01602         for (unsigned int j = 0; j < bindings.getCount(); j++) {
01603             const COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AnimationBinding& binding = bindings[j];
01604             std::vector<FCurve*>& curves = curve_map[binding.animation];
01605             COLLADAFW::AnimationList::AnimationClass animclass = binding.animationClass;
01606             char path[100];
01607 
01608             switch (type) {
01609             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE:
01610                 BLI_snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s.rotate (binding %u)", node_id, j);
01611                 break;
01612             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::SCALE:
01613                 BLI_snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s.scale (binding %u)", node_id, j);
01614                 break;
01615             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::TRANSLATE:
01616                 BLI_snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s.translate (binding %u)", node_id, j);
01617                 break;
01618             case COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX:
01619                 BLI_snprintf(path, sizeof(path), "%s.matrix (binding %u)", node_id, j);
01620                 break;
01621             default:
01622                 break;
01623             }
01624 
01625             if (animclass == COLLADAFW::AnimationList::UNKNOWN_CLASS) {
01626                 fprintf(stderr, "%s: UNKNOWN animation class\n", path);
01627                 //continue;
01628             }
01629 
01630             if (type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::ROTATE) {
01631                 if (curves.size() != 1) {
01632                     fprintf(stderr, "expected 1 curve, got %d\n", (int)curves.size());
01633                     return false;
01634                 }
01635 
01636                 // TODO support other animclasses
01637                 if (animclass != COLLADAFW::AnimationList::ANGLE) {
01638                     fprintf(stderr, "%s: animation class %d is not supported yet\n", path, animclass);
01639                     return false;
01640                 }
01641 
01642                 COLLADABU::Math::Vector3& axis = ((COLLADAFW::Rotate*)tm)->getRotationAxis();
01643 
01644                 float ax[3] = {axis[0], axis[1], axis[2]};
01645                 float angle = evaluate_fcurve(curves[0], fra);
01646                 axis_angle_to_mat4(mat, ax, angle);
01647 
01648                 return true;
01649             }
01650             else if (is_scale || is_translate) {
01651                 bool is_xyz = animclass == COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_XYZ;
01652 
01653                 if ((!is_xyz && curves.size() != 1) || (is_xyz && curves.size() != 3)) {
01654                     if (is_xyz)
01655                         fprintf(stderr, "%s: expected 3 curves, got %d\n", path, (int)curves.size());
01656                     else
01657                         fprintf(stderr, "%s: expected 1 curve, got %d\n", path, (int)curves.size());
01658                     return false;
01659                 }
01660                 
01661                 switch (animclass) {
01662                 case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_X:
01663                     vec[0] = evaluate_fcurve(curves[0], fra);
01664                     break;
01665                 case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_Y:
01666                     vec[1] = evaluate_fcurve(curves[0], fra);
01667                     break;
01668                 case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_Z:
01669                     vec[2] = evaluate_fcurve(curves[0], fra);
01670                     break;
01671                 case COLLADAFW::AnimationList::POSITION_XYZ:
01672                     vec[0] = evaluate_fcurve(curves[0], fra);
01673                     vec[1] = evaluate_fcurve(curves[1], fra);
01674                     vec[2] = evaluate_fcurve(curves[2], fra);
01675                     break;
01676                 default:
01677                     fprintf(stderr, "%s: animation class %d is not supported yet\n", path, animclass);
01678                     break;
01679                 }
01680             }
01681             else if (type == COLLADAFW::Transformation::MATRIX) {
01682                 // for now, of matrix animation, support only the case when all values are packed into one animation
01683                 if (curves.size() != 16) {
01684                     fprintf(stderr, "%s: expected 16 curves, got %d\n", path, (int)curves.size());
01685                     return false;
01686                 }
01687 
01688                 COLLADABU::Math::Matrix4 matrix;
01689                 int i = 0, j = 0;
01690 
01691                 for (std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator it = curves.begin(); it != curves.end(); it++) {
01692                     matrix.setElement(i, j, evaluate_fcurve(*it, fra));
01693                     j++;
01694                     if (j == 4) {
01695                         i++;
01696                         j = 0;
01697                     }
01698                     unused_curves.erase(std::remove(unused_curves.begin(), unused_curves.end(), *it), unused_curves.end());
01699                 }
01700 
01701                 COLLADAFW::Matrix tm(matrix);
01702                 dae_matrix_to_mat4(&tm, mat);
01703 
01704                 std::vector<FCurve*>::iterator it;
01705 
01706                 return true;
01707             }
01708         }
01709 
01710         if (is_scale)
01711             size_to_mat4(mat, vec);
01712         else
01713             copy_v3_v3(mat[3], vec);
01714 
01715         return is_scale || is_translate;
01716     }
01717 
01718     return false;
01719 }
01720 
01721 // gives a world-space mat of joint at rest position
01722 void AnimationImporter::get_joint_rest_mat(float mat[4][4], COLLADAFW::Node *root, COLLADAFW::Node *node)
01723 {
01724     // if bind mat is not available,
01725     // use "current" node transform, i.e. all those tms listed inside <node>
01726     if (!armature_importer->get_joint_bind_mat(mat, node)) {
01727         float par[4][4], m[4][4];
01728 
01729         calc_joint_parent_mat_rest(par, NULL, root, node);
01730         get_node_mat(m, node, NULL, NULL);
01731         mult_m4_m4m4(mat, par, m);
01732     }
01733 }
01734 
01735 // gives a world-space mat, end's mat not included
01736 bool AnimationImporter::calc_joint_parent_mat_rest(float mat[4][4], float par[4][4], COLLADAFW::Node *node, COLLADAFW::Node *end)
01737 {
01738     float m[4][4];
01739 
01740     if (node == end) {
01741         par ? copy_m4_m4(mat, par) : unit_m4(mat);
01742         return true;
01743     }
01744 
01745     // use bind matrix if available or calc "current" world mat
01746     if (!armature_importer->get_joint_bind_mat(m, node)) {
01747         if (par) {
01748             float temp[4][4];
01749             get_node_mat(temp, node, NULL, NULL);
01750             mult_m4_m4m4(m, par, temp);
01751         }
01752         else {
01753             get_node_mat(m, node, NULL, NULL);
01754         }
01755     }
01756 
01757     COLLADAFW::NodePointerArray& children = node->getChildNodes();
01758     for (unsigned int i = 0; i < children.getCount(); i++) {
01759         if (calc_joint_parent_mat_rest(mat, m, children[i], end))
01760             return true;
01761     }
01762 
01763     return false;
01764 }
01765 
01766 #ifdef ARMATURE_TEST
01767 Object *AnimationImporter::get_joint_object(COLLADAFW::Node *root, COLLADAFW::Node *node, Object *par_job)
01768 {
01769     if (joint_objects.find(node->getUniqueId()) == joint_objects.end()) {
01770         Object *job = add_object(scene, OB_EMPTY);
01771 
01772         rename_id((ID*)&job->id, (char*)get_joint_name(node));
01773 
01774         job->lay = object_in_scene(job, scene)->lay = 2;
01775 
01776         mul_v3_fl(job->size, 0.5f);
01777         job->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
01778 
01779         verify_adt_action((ID*)&job->id, 1);
01780 
01781         job->rotmode = ROT_MODE_QUAT;
01782 
01783         float mat[4][4];
01784         get_joint_rest_mat(mat, root, node);
01785 
01786         if (par_job) {
01787             float temp[4][4], ipar[4][4];
01788             invert_m4_m4(ipar, par_job->obmat);
01789             copy_m4_m4(temp, mat);
01790             mult_m4_m4m4(mat, ipar, temp);
01791         }
01792 
01793         TransformBase::decompose(mat, job->loc, NULL, job->quat, job->size);
01794 
01795         if (par_job) {
01796             job->parent = par_job;
01797 
01798             par_job->recalc |= OB_RECALC_OB;
01799             job->parsubstr[0] = 0;
01800         }
01801 
01802         where_is_object(scene, job);
01803 
01804         // after parenting and layer change
01805         DAG_scene_sort(CTX_data_main(C), scene);
01806 
01807         joint_objects[node->getUniqueId()] = job;
01808     }
01809 
01810     return joint_objects[node->getUniqueId()];
01811 }
01812 #endif
01813 
01814 #if 0
01815 // recursively evaluates joint tree until end is found, mat then is world-space matrix of end
01816 // mat must be identity on enter, node must be root
01817 bool AnimationImporter::evaluate_joint_world_transform_at_frame(float mat[4][4], float par[4][4], COLLADAFW::Node *node, COLLADAFW::Node *end, float fra)
01818 {
01819     float m[4][4];
01820     if (par) {
01821         float temp[4][4];
01822         evaluate_transform_at_frame(temp, node, node == end ? fra : 0.0f);
01823         mult_m4_m4m4(m, par, temp);
01824     }
01825     else {
01826         evaluate_transform_at_frame(m, node, node == end ? fra : 0.0f);
01827     }
01828 
01829     if (node == end) {
01830         copy_m4_m4(mat, m);
01831         return true;
01832     }
01833     else {
01834         COLLADAFW::NodePointerArray& children = node->getChildNodes();
01835         for (int i = 0; i < children.getCount(); i++) {
01836             if (evaluate_joint_world_transform_at_frame(mat, m, children[i], end, fra))
01837                 return true;
01838         }
01839     }
01840 
01841     return false;
01842 }
01843 #endif
01844 
01845 void AnimationImporter::add_bone_fcurve(Object *ob, COLLADAFW::Node *node, FCurve *fcu)
01846 {
01847     const char *bone_name = bc_get_joint_name(node);
01848     bAction *act = ob->adt->action;
01849             
01850     /* try to find group */
01851     bActionGroup *grp = action_groups_find_named(act, bone_name);
01852 
01853     /* no matching groups, so add one */
01854     if (grp == NULL) {
01855         /* Add a new group, and make it active */
01856         grp = (bActionGroup*)MEM_callocN(sizeof(bActionGroup), "bActionGroup");
01857                     
01858         grp->flag = AGRP_SELECTED;
01859         BLI_strncpy(grp->name, bone_name, sizeof(grp->name));
01860                     
01861         BLI_addtail(&act->groups, grp);
01862         BLI_uniquename(&act->groups, grp, "Group", '.', offsetof(bActionGroup, name), 64);
01863     }
01864                 
01865     /* add F-Curve to group */
01866     action_groups_add_channel(act, grp, fcu);
01867 }
01868 
01869 void AnimationImporter::add_bezt(FCurve *fcu, float fra, float value)
01870 {
01871     //float fps = (float)FPS;
01872     BezTriple bez;
01873     memset(&bez, 0, sizeof(BezTriple));
01874     bez.vec[1][0] = fra;
01875     bez.vec[1][1] = value;
01876     bez.ipo = BEZT_IPO_LIN ;/* use default interpolation mode here... */
01877     bez.f1 = bez.f2 = bez.f3 = SELECT;
01878     bez.h1 = bez.h2 = HD_AUTO;
01879     insert_bezt_fcurve(fcu, &bez, 0);
01880     calchandles_fcurve(fcu);
01881 }
